raw_text: PUSSEDENIYA – Y.B. (Former Secretary to the Ministry of Public Administration and Home Affairs,​ Co-operatives and Chief Secretary – Sabaragamuwa Provincial Council). Beloved husband of Upananda,​ loving father of Thusitha,​ Deepthi and Chandana,​ father-in-law of Sriyanath,​ Dinantha and Shermila,​ grandfather of Dinuka,​ Chethaka,​ Sharmal,​ Sahani and Shakya,​ great grandfather of Dinuth,​ expired. Body will be handed over to the Peradeniya Medical Faculty at 2.00 p.m. on 06.12.2023. Will leave home at Aranayaka at 12.00 noon on 06.12.2023. Hakurugammana,​ Aranayaka.080560
